title: The NSA Swears It Has ‘No Backdoors’ in Next-Gen Encryption
content: Plus: New details of ICE’s dragnet surveillance in the US, Clearview AI agrees to limit sales of its faceprint database, and more.
description: Plus: New details of ICE’s dragnet surveillance in the US, Clearview AI agrees to limit sales of its faceprint database, and more security news this week.
